system.effect:
Cost: $1000 in materials
Target: Your Shadow Pokémon at Friendship Level 3
Effect: You perform a Purification Ceremony on the target, granting Purification rewards. A Pokémon that undergoes Purification with this Feature gains 1 Friendship. At Master Charm, the Target changes to "Your Shadow Pokémon at Friendship Level 2".
Bonus: Your Purified Pokémon receive a total of X Points to distribute amongst their Base Stats, where X is equal to your Charm Skill Rank, and they gain 2 Tutor Points.
